message: Hi John! I'm doing great, thanks. How about you?
I'm good too, thanks for asking. Did you have a good weekend?
Yes, it was fantastic! I went hiking with some friends. What about you?
That sounds fun! I had a relaxing weekend and caught up on some reading.
Definitely! I just finished reading 'Educated' by Tara Westover. It's a captivating memoir.
Oh, I've heard about that book. I'll add it to my reading list. Thanks!
